game.name: Hunting Bigfoot
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Roaming through the night hunting for his next victim, Bigfoot has gone rogue and it's up to You to end it all.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Roaming through the night hunting for his next victim, Bigfoot has gone rogue and it's up to You to end it all.
